Organisation:
RAMP - Renewal 
Refugee and Migrant Project

Process: Drop-in (arrive 9.30am for 10am open) Brentford and Chiswick CAB.
Drop-in (arrive at 9 for 9.30 open) at Montague Hall, Hounslow, TW3 1LD
Call for appointment (Bridgelink Centre, Summerwood Rd, Iselworth, TW7 7QU
Drop-in (arrive 9.30 for 10 open) at Heston Fam Community Centre, TW5 0UP
Drop-in (arrive at 9am for 9.30 open) at Montague Hall, TW3 1LD

Services: Budget planning course, Debt Advice, Job support
Process: There are not any debt centres in London but may be elsewhere - use website to find out what service is available in local area
They have a drop in on Wednesdays 12.30-1.30pm with advisors
Free telephone helpline, with possibility of further support - including Debt Relief Orders
Call for an appointment 9am-5pm, may have a wait of 8 days. Also Thursday 5pm onwards.
